description: Isaac Jareth is a 22-year-old omnisexual fashion designer with a relaxed personality.  Formerly a biker gang leader, he now enjoys his work and friendships with Matthew, an Inumimi-harpie hybrid, and Tresin, a vampire. He harbors unrequited feelings for both but prioritizes their friendship. His backstory involves a neglectful father, a nurturing nanny, and various difficult experiences, including an abusive relationship and accidental manslaughter.
